customengraving.name: Ragged Old Rug
customengraving.description: It smells like a diggle has been using it as a bed.

customengraving.name: Ragged Old Rug
customengraving.description: It's a ragged old rug. Best let it be.

customengraving.name: Ragged Old Rug
customengraving.description: There is no treasure under this rug. Really. Would I lie to you?

customblocker.name: Kaput Voltaic Luminescence Lamp
customblocker.description: Why does it have to flicker like that!

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: An obviously trapped weapon rack. Dredmor has a funny sense of fun. Not ha-ha funny, but more 'undead lich simmering in own hatred for eons' funny.

customblocker.name: Rubble
customblocker.description: A portion of the ceiling and walls have collapsed, making traversal mind-numbingly unlikely.

customblocker.name: Blockage
customblocker.description: Large chunks of stone completely obstruct the hallway.

customblocker.name: Rubble
customblocker.description: A portion of the ceiling and walls have collapsed. Passage is exceedingly improbable.

customblocker.name: Blockage
customblocker.description: Large blocks of stone blocks completely block the blocked hallway. Blockity block block. Somebody should buy a blocking thesaurus.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker in the dank dungeon breeze.

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The stench of old seafood chokes the candle flame.

pedestal.name: Warning
pedestal.text: This is a test of the Emergency Dungeon Warning System. This is only a test. Had this been a real emergency, you would be dead now.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: It's a little nest.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: It's a little nest.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: It's a little nest.

customblocker.name: Anonymous Dead
customblocker.description: Just another skeleton in the catacomb. What's up?

customblocker.name: Anonymous Dead
customblocker.description: A dessicated body hanging out in a comfy notch.

customblocker.name: Cheaply Buried
customblocker.description: His friends and family saved money on the coffin by keeping his remains in an old shoe box.

customblocker.name: Loculus
customblocker.description: This one remains unopened and undisturbed. Let's leave it that way.

customblocker.name: Bits of the Dead
customblocker.description: These bones have been... chewed.

customblocker.name: Anonymous Dead
customblocker.description: Died with their boots on.

customblocker.name: Smelly Grave
customblocker.description: This one exudes an especially pungent stench.

customblocker.name: Anonymous Dead
customblocker.description: The Deths' share of zorkmids are still with this skeleton.

customblocker.name: Infested Dead
customblocker.description: A centipede scurries amongst the bones, yuck.

customblocker.name: Anonymous Dead
customblocker.description: The mummified remains of someone long-dead and long-forgotten.

customblocker.name: Iron Grate
customblocker.description: The iron bars of the Zombie Zoo.

customblocker.name: Dredmor Auxilliary Zombie Zoo
customblocker.description: We hope you enjoy the exhibits. Please pull the lever for a feeding demonstration.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: You've found the ancestral breeding grounds of the diggles. Eww.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: A little nest on a little island.

customengraving.name: Diggle Nest
customengraving.description: A little nest.

customblocker.name: Skeleton
customblocker.description: Looks like a bit more than a flesh wound.

customblocker.name: Sewer Grate
customblocker.description: Sometimes known as a Dwarven Educational Grate, because they fill their sewers and schools with the same things.

customblocker.name: Sewer Grate
customblocker.description: Sometimes known as a Dwarven Educational Grate, because they fill their sewers and schools with the same things.

customblocker.name: Sewer Grate
customblocker.description: Sometimes known as a Dwarven Educational Grate, because they fill their sewers and schools with the same things.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Still
customblocker.description: A still for swill. You've found a secret moonshine operation.

customblocker.name: Reading Nook
customblocker.description: The shelf is dotted with trashy novels, and circular coffee stains. This is clearly some monsters favorite reading spot.

customblocker.name: Starboard Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the starboard bow.

customblocker.name: Starboard Cannon
customblocker.description: The recoil from firing has pushed this cannon back from the gunport.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: Primed and ready to fire a shot off the port bow. Don't tell me you thought this ship was a library.

customblocker.name: Port Cannon
customblocker.description: The recoil from firing has pushed this cannon back from the gunport.

customblocker.name: Dusty Bookcase
customblocker.description: On this shelf are half a dozen signed copies of 'Everything I Ever Needed To Know About Love I Learned From A Dusty Tome.'

customblocker.name: Dusty Bookcase
customblocker.description: A book catches your attention: 'Myth or Fact: The Secret Truth About Eyebrow Degeneracy And What Must Be Done About It by L. Dredmor'.

customblocker.name: Mysterious Glass Square
customblocker.description: This screen allows the Diggles to spy on the rest of this floor.

customblocker.name: Flickering Glass Square
customblocker.description: Staring at this thing makes your head hurt. Was that a flipper?

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: It's one of those thinking machines. It doesn't look too bright.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: It's one of those thinking machines. It doesn't look too bright.

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine

customblocker.name: Thinking Machine
customblocker.description: It's one of those thinking machines. It doesn't look too bright.

customblocker.name: Commando Schedule
customblocker.description: This place is the headquarters - the nerve center - that coordinates all Diggle activity on this floor.

customblocker.name: Propaganda Poster
customblocker.description: 'When you walk with Dredmor, you walk with Victory. May his black geometry guide us! This message approved by Lord Dredmor.'

customblocker.name: Emergency Procedures
customblocker.description: In case of emergency, open chest.

customblocker.name: Countertop
customblocker.description: A window into the kitchen so you can smell what's cookin'.

customblocker.name: Dusty Bookcase
customblocker.description: There's a well-used copy on this shelf of 'To Serve Man', in the original language. If only you had time to translate.

customblocker.name: Countertop
customblocker.description: A window into the kitchen so you can smell what's cookin'.

pedestal.name: Secret Listening Post
pedestal.text: Secret Diggle Listening Post. Commando Diggles spend hours here, quietly listening at the walls. (There could be more spying on you even now.)

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: A sturdy rack for holding weaponry.

customblocker.name: Sewer Grate
customblocker.description: Sometimes known as a Dwarven Educational Grate, because they fill their sewers and schools with the same things.

customblocker.name: Dwarven Still
customblocker.description: A still for swill. You've found the secret moonshine operation that funds Dredmor's armies.

action.text: Swarmies! You'd heard rumors they liked to swarm. Apparently, the rumors are actually true!

customengraving.name: Floor Candles
customengraving.description: The candles flicker judgmentally at you.

action.text: Wow! A newborn monster just grew out of that fecund patch of foetid dirt right in freaking front of you. Isn't the circle of life fabulous?

customblocker.name: Amateur Butchery Project
customblocker.description: Just another side of 'beef'.

action.text: The ice beneath your feet shudders and breaks, blasting you with icicles and frigid water.
The ice beneath your feet shudders and breaks, blasting you with icicles and frigid water.

customblocker.description: The fishy little flame beats with the steady rhythm of the waves.

customblocker.name: Neglected Anvil
customblocker.description: This Anvil of Krong has been shamefully run out of juice.

action.text: Praises to the faithful adventurer, you have turned on the generator! Krong may reward you! Or not.

customblocker.description: The furnace was recently used, and is still quite warm.

customblocker.description: A well-used smelter furnace.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: A wooden weapon rack.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

customblocker.name: Brazier
customblocker.description: These flames burn for the glory of Krong.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames flicker fickly toward you.

customblocker.name: Wall Sconce
customblocker.description: The flames flicker fickly away from you.

customengraving.name: Porcine Parts
customengraving.description: The remains of a throttled truffle-hunting pig.

customblocker.name: Small Apple Tree
customblocker.description: As befits a tree with such low-hanging fruit, they've all been picked. Just a few bad apples remain on the ground.

customblocker.name: Diggle Nest
customblocker.description: The ceiling above this nest is mirrored.

custombreakable.name: Dining Table
custombreakable.description: A long table so Dredmor can sit very far from his 'guests'.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Rusty old bars.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Stout iron bars.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Rusty old bars.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Stout iron bars, caked in blood.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Stout iron bars.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: The thought of languishing in Dredmor's penal system makes you feel sick. Or was it that lutefisk?

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Scratches on the bar suggest that someone - or something - tried really hard to break out of this cell.

customblocker.name: Bars
customblocker.description: Rusty old bars.

customblocker.name: Chalked Scrawl
customblocker.description: It says 'Fish in a (very long and narrow) barrel.'

customblocker.name: Rubble
customblocker.description: A portion of the ceiling and walls have collapsed, making passage virtually impossible.

customblocker.name: Blockage
customblocker.description: Large chunks of stone completely occlude the hallway.

customblocker.name: Wandering Monster Table
customblocker.description: Here's where monsters play monster poker between rounds of aimlessly wandering the dungeons.

customblocker.name: Monster Computer
customblocker.description: A monster computer. It is engraved with some kind of fruit.

customblocker.name: Weapon Rack
customblocker.description: The monsters are still learning how to use weapons.

customblocker.name: Stockroom Notices
customblocker.description: Stock-room is for the use of employees and clever customers only. You break it, you bought it.

customblocker.name: Open Grave
customblocker.description: They say 'you can't take it with you'.

customblocker.name: Empty Casket
customblocker.description: Some call it grave-robbing, Brax calls it supply and demand.

customblocker.name: Looted Grave
customblocker.description: A looted coffin, devoid of all valuables.

customblocker.name: Grave of Lineas
customblocker.description: A powerful summoner and collector of exotic monsters, Lineas asked that he be buried with all his favorite pets. Unfortunately for them, he died young.
